summary: This is a court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It records the filing of supplementary papers by Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team in support of a motion to consolidate appeals. The document is a procedural update in her ongoing criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

events.title: Filing of Supplementary Papers
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team filed supplementary papers in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals in support of a motion to consolidate appeals in her criminal case.

keyFacts: The document is a procedural filing in the appellate case United States v. Maxwell (20-3061) before the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.
Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team filed supplementary papers in support of a motion to consolidate appeals.
The filing indicates ongoing legal proceedings and appeals in Maxwell's criminal case as of September 2020.
Attorneys Ty Gee and Adam Mueller are identified as legal counsel of record for Maxwell in this appellate matter.
